commits.author: CohenCyril
commits.message:
Experimental linters for ssreflect style (awk + sed scripts)

- an awk script to print messages (no rewriting here).
  +  checking that lines are less than 80 characters long
  + checking that indentation is formed by an even number of spaces
  + checking for terminators in one line proofs
  + /!\ "indentation for subgoal" checking is not implemented yet
- a sed script for systematic rewriting for spacing mostly, use with caution!!
